mapper.insert: insert into consumption (cno, status, total_amount, pay_amount, discount_amount, info, pay_time, payee_id, customer_name, customer_tel, car_licence, car_type, appointment_ano, checkin_time, checkout_time, business_id, create_time, create_user_id, audit_time, auditor_id) values (#{cno}, #{status}, #{totalAmount}, #{payAmount}, #{discountAmount}, #{info}, #{payTime}, #{payee.id}, #{customerName}, #{customerTel}, #{carLicence}, #{carType}, #{appointmentAno}, #{checkinTime}, #{checkoutTime}, #{business.id}, #{createTime}, #{createUser.id}, #{auditTime}, #{auditor.id})
mapper.update: update consumption set cno = #{cno}, status = #{status}, total_amount = #{totalAmount}, pay_amount = #{payAmount}, discount_amount = #{discountAmount}, info = #{info}, pay_time = #{payTime}, payee_id = #{payee.id}, customer_name = #{customerName}, customer_tel = #{customerTel}, car_licence = #{carLicence}, car_type = #{carType}, appointment_ano = #{appointmentAno}, checkin_time = #{checkinTime}, checkout_time = #{checkoutTime}, business_id = #{business.id}, create_time = #{createTime}, create_user_id = #{createUser.id}, audit_time = #{auditTime}, auditor_id = #{auditor.id} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select c.id, c.cno, c.status, c.total_amount, c.pay_amount, c.discount_amount, c.info, c.pay_time, c.payee_id, c.customer_name, c.customer_tel, c.car_licence, c.car_type, c.appointment_ano, c.checkin_time, c.checkout_time, c.business_id, c.create_time, c.create_user_id, c.audit_time, c.auditor_id ,b.id as b_id,b.name as b_name, cu.id AS cu_id,cu.name AS cu_name, p.id AS p_id,p.name AS p_name, a.id AS a_id,a.name AS a_name from consumption c JOIN business b on c.business_id = b.id JOIN employee cu on c.create_user_id = cu.id left JOIN employee p on c.payee_id = p.id left JOIN employee a on c.auditor_id = a.id where c.id =#{id}
